analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol#90) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol#116-123)

Bricktox.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol#207-208)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol#90)
XBTToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol#19-21)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x162c91e864d37055f7d5696b845f3af520cd911d.sol:
